turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order us some PIZZA

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay I can do that for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: order enough food for 5 people.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so I think 3 larges

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that's fine, one with pepperoni and two with cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok would you like any drinks to go with that

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, we need some cokes and diet cokes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately they are out of diet coke

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok then all cokes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else to eat with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how about some breadsticks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, then I will place the order for 3 pizzas, 5 cokes and 2 orders of bread sticks. please confirm

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that is great, confirmed

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok I ordered from pizza hut, ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes they are the best

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we also get a free pizza after we order 10 total pies

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that will be soon enough

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i will be there

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks you are the best!
